availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk. (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Son of George W. Johnston and Rosa Johnston. Married to Sue Carras Johnston. Father of George W. Johnston, and Ida B. Johnston. Attended school in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 369B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 221.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 11, pp. 495B-496A.
"Charles P. Johnston, Jr.," Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4954.
